java/liquibase/database/sql/CreateIndexStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00007 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00008 
00009 import java.util.Arrays;
00010 import java.util.Iterator;
00011 
00012 public class CreateIndexStatement implements SqlStatement {
00013 
00014     private String tableSchemaName;
00015     private String indexName;
00016     private String tableName;
00017     private String[] columns;
00018     private String tablespace;
00019 
00020     public CreateIndexStatement(String indexName, String tableSchemaName, String tableName, String... columns) {
00021         this.indexName = indexName;
00022         this.tableSchemaName = tableSchemaName;
00023         this.tableName = tableName;
00024         this.columns = columns;
00025     }
00026 
00027     public String getTableSchemaName() {
00028         return tableSchemaName;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public String getIndexName() {
00032         return indexName;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getTableName() {
00036         return tableName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String[] getColumns() {
00040         return columns;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getTablespace() {
00044         return tablespace;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public CreateIndexStatement setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00048         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00049 
00050         return this;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00054    StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00055         buffer.append("CREATE INDEX ");
00056         buffer.append(getIndexName()).append(" ON ");
00057         buffer.append(database.escapeTableName(getTableSchemaName(), getTableName())).append("(");
00058         Iterator<String> iterator = Arrays.asList(getColumns()).iterator();
00059         while (iterator.hasNext()) {
00060             String column = iterator.next();
00061             buffer.append(column);
00062             if (iterator.hasNext()) {
00063                 buffer.append(", ");
00064             }
00065         }
00066         buffer.append(")");
00067 
00068         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getTablespace()) != null && database.supportsTablespaces()) {
00069             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00070                 buffer.append(" ON ").append(getTablespace());
00071             } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00072                 // cannot add indexes to tablespace in DB2
00073             } else {
00074                 buffer.append(" TABLESPACE ").append(getTablespace());
00075             }
00076         }
00077 
00078         return buffer.toString();
00079     }
00080 
00081     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00082         return ";";
00083     }
00084 
00085     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00086         return true;
00087     }
00088 }
